title: Theodore Roosevelt National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Find lesson plans for subjects on life sciences, earth sciences and social studies. Most lessons are designed for 4th-6th grade students, but can be easily adapted for older or younger audiences. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips The best way for your students to experience Theodore Roosevelt National Park is to bring them to the park! We have resources to help you plan your own field trip, or you can register for our ranger-led environmental education program, where students learn from a ranger about prairie dog communities and their importance in the ecosystem. All Field Trips
